comments.content:
Try this [http://www.whatfontis.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144922/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com/")  
I upload you pic and found two almost similar fonts.

On typophile.com the best place to post for a font identification is:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417144922/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid "http://www.typophile.com/typeid")  
or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.

That's Times New Roman. Or Comic Sans. Not sure.

hhp
